channel.title: Our Courses on ISP - PROMETEO
channel.description: Recent content in Our Courses on ISP - PROMETEO

item.title: Anna Jungbluth
item.description: About Me Anna Jungbluth is a Research Fellow at the European Space Agency (ESA), where she works in the Climate Team on machine learning applications for Earth Observation.

item.title: David Chaparro Danon
item.description: About Me David Chaparro Danon is a postdoctoral researcher at CREAF.

item.title: Devis Tuia
item.description: About Me My research focuses on machine learning, remote sensing, and spatial analysis applied to Earth observation.

item.title: Ioannis N. Athanasiadis
item.description: About Me Ioannis N. Athanasiadis is a Professor and Chair of Artificial Intelligence at Wageningen University & Research (WUR) in the Netherlands.

item.title: Maurizio Mencuccini
item.description: About Me Maurizio Mencuccini is an ICREA Researcher in Plant and Ecosystem Ecology at CREAF.

item.title: Michele Meroni
item.description: About Me Michele Meroni is a Remote Sensing Consultant at SEIDOR and a former Scientific Officer at the Joint Research Centre (JRC) of the European Commission.

item.title: Pierre Gentine
item.description: About Me Pierre Gentine is a Professor in the Department of Earth and Environmental Engineering and the Department of Earth and Environmental Sciences at Columbia University.

item.title: Rafael Prieto-Curiel
item.description: About Me Rafael Prieto-Curiel is a faculty member at the Complexity Science Hub (CSH) in Vienna, Austria.
